        Returns:

        public boolean addChunk(Chunk c)

        Parameters:
        c - chunk to be added
        Returns:
        true if is stored, false otherwise

      • isStored

        public boolean isStored(Chunk c)
        Checks if a chunk is already stored. The comparision is made with the chunk's id and file id
        Parameters:
        c - chunk to be checked if is stored
        Returns:
        true if it's stored, otherwise false
